alert.note: Alert for Guayanilla; Penuelas; Ponce; Sabana Grande; Yauco (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 27 at 12:31PM ADT until October 27 at 5:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Guayanilla County in Puerto Rico... Penuelas County in Puerto Rico... Ponce County in Puerto Rico... Sabana Grande County in Puerto Rico... Yauco County in Puerto Rico... * Until 400 PM AST. * At 1131 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 3 inches in 3 hours. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ponce, Yauco, Penuelas, Guayanilla, Sabana Grande, Santo Domingo, Tallaboa Alta, Coto Laurel, Capitanejo, Palomas, Magas Arriba, Tallaboa, Marueno, Indios, Lluveras and Liborio Negron Torres. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1-3 INCHES IN 3 HOURS
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

area.areaDesc: Guayanilla; Penuelas; Ponce; Sabana Grande; Yauco
